category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 32 (ESG Management Committee)
contents: Article 32 (ESG Management Committee) The ESG Management Committee responds to the chairman's advice on the following matters. 1. Matters related to the establishment of ESG management strategies and implementation plans 2. Matters related to improving the ESG management system and checking the implementation of promotions 3. Other matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the ESG Management Committee and submitted by the Chairman [This article was newly established in 2023. 7. 5.]
